p: Please make sure you check if the aridity index in Figure 6 and Figure 7 is the same as the aridity gradient used in Figure 3. We think this is not the case and very confusing. If necessary, you should "reverse" the x-axis in Figures 6– 7 by using the same measure as in Figure 3. Like this the soil nutrients will be negatively correlated with decreased water supply as they should (you write in the Results "Soil N and P concentrations decreased with increasing aridity…").
